title: Announcement: Winter Storms
description:
Hey y'all ! We are trying our best to get online and bring you some creepy content, but historic storms in the Dallas area have made that impossible. We’ll be back as soon as we can. We hope everyone impacted by the storm is safe and warm. We miss you all and can’t wait to come back soon. Thanks for listening and keep it creepy.
Head over to our Patreon for bonus content: https://www.patreon.com/sinisterhood
Support Sinisterhood
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
